# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Blueshield Officer
The Blueshield Officer is a specialist role, a well equipped bodyguard typically designated to the NT Representative, however in their absence should guard the next highest ranking officer.
## Do - Guard the protectee, typically the NT Representative, or next highest ranking officer. - Be prepared to lay your life on the line for the protectee. - Take orders only from your assigned protectee. You are like a Familiar, however you must still act within the limits of the law (and rules). - Look sick in that blue trimmed uniform.
## Don't - Get involved in Station Security affairs unless ordered to or it is required. You are a bodyguard, not a security officer. - Lose your weapon.
